017package com.fns.grivet.controller;
018
019import java.net.URI;
020import java.time.LocalDateTime;
021import java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit;
022import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
023import org.json.JSONArray;
024import org.json.JSONObject;
025import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
026import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
027import org.springframework.cloud.context.config.annotation.RefreshScope;
028import org.springframework.context.annotation.Profile;
029import org.springframework.format.annotation.DateTimeFormat;
030import org.springframework.http.HttpHeaders;
031import org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;
032import org.springframework.http.MediaType;
033import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
034import org.springframework.security.access.prepost.PreAuthorize;
035import org.springframework.util.Assert;
036import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.DeleteMapping;
037import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.GetMapping;
038import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PatchMapping;
039import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PathVariable;
040import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PostMapping;
041import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
042import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestHeader;
043import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
044import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestParam;
045import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;
046import org.springframework.web.util.UriComponentsBuilder;
047import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
048import com.fns.grivet.service.EntityService;
049import io.micrometer.core.instrument.MeterRegistry;
050
051/**
052 * Provides end-points for type storage and retrieval
053 *
054 * @author Chris Phillipson
055 */
056@RefreshScope
057@RestController
058@RequestMapping(consumes = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_VALUE, produces = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_VALUE)
059public class EntityController {
060        @SuppressWarnings("all")
061        private static final org.slf4j.Logger log = org.slf4j.LoggerFactory.getLogger(EntityController.class);
062        @Value("${grivet.store.batch-size:100}")
063        private int batchSize;
064        private final EntityService entityService;
065        private final MeterRegistry meterRegistry;
066
067        @Autowired
068        public EntityController(EntityService entityService, MeterRegistry meterRegistry) {
069                this.entityService = entityService;
070                this.meterRegistry = meterRegistry;
071        }
072
073        @Profile("!pipeline")
074        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'write:type\')")
075        @PostMapping("/type")
076        public ResponseEntity<?> createOne(@RequestHeader("Type") String type, @RequestBody JSONObject json) {
077                Long oid = entityService.create(type, json);
078                URI location = UriComponentsBuilder.newInstance().path("/type").queryParam("oid", oid).build().toUri();
079                meterRegistry.counter(String.join("store", "create", type)).increment();
080                log.info("Successfully created type [{}]", type);
081                return ResponseEntity.created(location).build();
082        }
083
084        @Profile("!pipeline")
085        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'write:type\')")
086        @PostMapping("/types")
087        public ResponseEntity<?> createMultiple(@RequestHeader("Type") String type, @RequestBody JSONArray json) {
088                int numberOfTypesToCreate = json.length();
089                Assert.isTrue(numberOfTypesToCreate <= batchSize, "The total number of entries in a request must not exceed %d! Your store request contained [%d] entries.".formatted(batchSize, numberOfTypesToCreate));
090                int errorCount = 0;
091                JSONObject jsonObject = null;
092                HttpHeaders headers = new HttpHeaders();
093                URI location = null;
094                Long oid = null;
095                // allow for all JSONObjects within JSONArray to be processed; capture and report errors during processing
096                for (int i = 0; i < numberOfTypesToCreate; i++) {
097                        try {
098                                jsonObject = json.getJSONObject(i);
099                                oid = entityService.create(type, jsonObject);
100                                location = UriComponentsBuilder.newInstance().path("/type").queryParam("oid", oid).build().toUri();
101                                if (numberOfTypesToCreate == 1) {
102                                        headers.setLocation(location);
103                                } else {
104                                        headers.set("Location[%s]".formatted(String.valueOf(i + 1)), location.toASCIIString());
105                                }
106                                meterRegistry.counter(String.join("store", "create", type)).increment();
107                                log.info("Successfully created type [{}]", type);
108                        } catch (Exception e) {
109                                String message = LogUtil.toLog(jsonObject, "Problems storing type! Portion of payload @ index[%d]\n".formatted(i + 1));
110                                log.error(message, e);
111                                if (numberOfTypesToCreate == 1) {
112                                        throw e;
113                                }
114                                headers.set("Error[%s]".formatted(String.valueOf(i + 1)), e.getMessage());
115                                errorCount++;
116                        }
117                }
118                return new ResponseEntity<>(headers, ((errorCount == 0) ? HttpStatus.CREATED : HttpStatus.ACCEPTED));
119        }
120
121        @Profile("!pipeline")
122        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'write:type\')")
123        @PatchMapping("/type")
124        public ResponseEntity<?> updateOne(@RequestParam(value = "oid", required = true) Long oid, @RequestBody JSONObject json) {
125                String type = entityService.update(oid, json);
126                HttpHeaders headers = new HttpHeaders();
127                URI location = UriComponentsBuilder.newInstance().path("/type").queryParam("oid", oid).build().toUri();
128                headers.setLocation(location);
129                meterRegistry.counter(String.join("store", "update", type)).increment();
130                log.info("Successfully updated type [{}]", type);
131                return ResponseEntity.ok().headers(headers).build();
132        }
133
134        @Profile("!pipeline")
135        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'delete:type\')")
136        @DeleteMapping("/type")
137        public ResponseEntity<?> deleteOne(@RequestParam(value = "oid", required = true) Long oid) {
138                String type = entityService.delete(oid);
139                meterRegistry.counter(String.join("store", "delete", type)).increment();
140                log.info("Successfully delete type [{}]", type);
141                return ResponseEntity.ok().build();
142        }
143
144        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'read:type\')")
145        @GetMapping("/type/{type}")
146        public ResponseEntity<?> fetch(@PathVariable("type") String type, @RequestParam(value = "createdTimeStart", required = false) @DateTimeFormat(iso = DateTimeFormat.ISO.DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime createdTimeStart, @RequestParam(value = "createdTimeEnd", required = false) @DateTimeFormat(iso = DateTimeFormat.ISO.DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime createdTimeEnd, @RequestParam(value = "noAudit", defaultValue = "false") boolean noAudit, HttpServletRequest request) throws JsonProcessingException {
147                LocalDateTime start = createdTimeStart == null ? LocalDateTime.now().minusDays(7) : createdTimeStart;
148                LocalDateTime end = createdTimeEnd == null ? LocalDateTime.now() : createdTimeEnd;
149                Assert.isTrue(ChronoUnit.SECONDS.between(start, end) >= 0, "Store request constraint createdTimeStart must be earlier or equal to createdTimeEnd!");
150                if (noAudit) {
151                        return ResponseEntity.ok(entityService.findAllByType(type));
152                } else {
153                        return ResponseEntity.ok(entityService.findByCreatedTime(type, start, end, request.getParameterMap()));
154                }
155        }
156
157        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'read:type\')")
158        @GetMapping("/type")
159        public ResponseEntity<?> fetchOne(@RequestParam(value = "oid", required = true) Long oid) {
160                return ResponseEntity.ok(entityService.findById(oid));
161        }
162}
